In a message dated 1/19/2008 7:41:07 P.M. Eastern Standard Time,  
lcdupla@... writes:

 
 
 
Steve/Bruce, can you listen to the woman's voice on the recording I  
posted a few threads ago and tell me what you think she is saying? 
It  sounds more like an EVP.

LC

--- In _EVP-ITC@yahoogroupsEVP-_ (mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com) ,  "Steve 
Hultay" <urkel23@...> wrote:
>
> I know Frank  does mostly direct recordings. I have on occasion, 
but 
> for the  most part no. My audio seems pretty clear without direct 
> recording,  so i stick with what works for me. I don't seem to get 
a 
> lot of  noise from the speaker really.
> 
> -Steve H.
> 
>  
> 
> 
> --- In _EVP-ITC@yahoogroupsEVP-_ (mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com) , "LC  
Duplatt" <lcdupla@> wrote:
> >
> >  Steve...Bruce.  Steve...Bruce.<WBR>..no one is direct 
regarding  
> the 
> > same?
> > 
> > --- In _EVP-ITC@yahoogroupsEVP-_ (mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com) , "LC  
Duplatt" <lcdupla@> wrote:
> > >
> > > Is anyone  currently recording box sessions from the box to the 
> audio 
>  > > recorder without sending it through speaker(s) first? 
> >  > 
> > > I think the (amplified) speakers add quite a bit of  hiss and 
then 
> a 
> > > microphone has to pick up the  bouncing sound, hiss and ambient 
> noise -
> > 
> >  > not as clear as direct recording a session (I would assume).
> >  > 
> > > LC
> > > _http://www.AngelsGhhttp://w_ (http://www.angelsghosts.com/) 
>  > >
> >
>
